install.name: System - K2 Indexer
install.author: Matt Thomas
install.description: To trigger this plugin, simply add indexk2=[tags|categories]&category=[catID] to the URL when logged into the backend of your Joomla website, where catID is the ID of the K2 category to index and indexk2 needs to be either "tags" or "categories" to indicate what to index (e.g. administrator/index.php?indexk2=categories&category=7)
